original_text: The boundary goes out to the shoulder of the hill north of Ekron, then the boundary bends around to Shikkeron and passes along to Mount Baalah and goes out to Jabneel. Then the boundary comes to an end at the sea.
korean_text: 또 에그론 비탈 북쪽으로 나아가 식그론으로 접어들어 바알라 산을 지나고 얍느엘에 이르나니 그 끝은 바다며

sentences.original_text: The boundary goes out to the shoulder of the hill north of Ekron
sentences.korean_translation: 그 경계는 에그론 북쪽 산의 어깨까지 나아갑니다.

sentences.original_text: then the boundary bends around to Shikkeron
and passes along to Mount Baalah
Then the boundary comes to an end at the sea
